subject: Entitlement of diplomatic/ official passports to officers working in autonomous bodies and PSUs
text: 4 1 HRay 7ry TTFTf  wfixahz<ur 54 'Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (7*, 4f*ai7 ak {TM'II4A '14/e14) 454& Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 m National Highways Authority of India (Ministry ol Road Transport ard Highways) 52 #1-5 Vi 6, 04z7-10, ETrGI, 7{ Arrff-110075 G-5 & 6, Seclor-10, Dwarka, Ncw Delhi-110075 No.NHAI/11041/08/2010-HR.I 01.10.2013 OFFICE MEMORANDUM Sub: Entitlement of diplomatlc ofticlal passports fo offcers working in autonomous bodies and PSUs The Joint Secretary & CVO, MoRT&H vide letter No.C-30019/7/2013-Vig: dated 9.9.2013 (Annexure) has  informed that Ministry of External Affairs has broughf to the notice of MoRT&H that officers working in autonomous bodies and PSUs are not entitled to of diplomatic or official passports as per extant rules on this subject. However, if they are going on official assignment abroad, Chairman and officers on deputation to NHAI shall be issued only Note Verbale for the respective Embassy/ High Commission: 2 It has been directed to inform all officers officials working in NHAI that they are required to travel abroad on their personal passport even on official assignments. 3 All officers/ officials holding diplomatic or olficial passports are requested to surrender the same to Ministry of External Affairs forthwith: (PC. Grover) CGM (Admn: & HR} To, AlLoficers and employees of NHAI Copy for information to: 1 _ JS & CVO, MoRT&H 2. CVO, NHAI IHALE grant
